definition: a piece or mass of indefinite size and shape

examples: few candidates ever started with such a lump who did not get the nomination
came to with nothing more than a lump on his head

definition: a person who is heavy and awkward, one who is stupid or dull

examples: had taken a lot of lumps growing up in the city
can cheerfully take his lumps on losers, because the payout is big on the winners

definition: a constriction of the throat caused by emotion
to make into lumps, to make lumps on or in
to move oneself noisily and clumsily
